entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
